mapper.select: select question_id, question_title, question_content, question_regdate, question_upddate, m.member_name, category_id, member_nickname, member_identification from view_question q join tbl_member m where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_question (question_title, question_content, member_id, category_id) values(#{questionTitle}, #{questionContent},#{memberId}, #{categoryId})
